title: Some logs of tikv-ctl are not printed on offline mode
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?

5.3.0

### Steps to reproduce

```
tikv-ctl --db /path/to/tikv/db unsafe-recover remove-fail-stores -s 4,5 --all-regions
```

### What did happened?

The logs located in `debug.rs` are not shown.
